bio.summary: I am a recent graduate of the Iron Yard’s 12 week full time Rails Engineering Bootcamp. My core competencies are Ruby on Rails, Postgresql, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3 and other related technologies. I have experience with RSpec and Test Driven Development. Prior to this, I had been working in engineering related roles in the manufacturing industry.

experience.summary: I am a recent graduate of the Iron Yard’s 12 week full time Rails Engineering Bootcamp. My core competencies are Ruby on Rails, Postgresql, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3 and other related technologies. I have experience with RSpec and Test Driven Development. Prior to this, I had been working in engineering related roles in the manufacturing industry.

work.summary: Managed the development of medical devices. Responsible for the direction to a small team of enigneers.
highlights: Led a team of department stakeholders and engineers to receipt of clearance to market a medical device from the FDA.
Led a team to prove the viablity of a new technology platform for assembly of hyperdermic needles.
Successully reduced the cost of an existing product line by 30%.

work.summary: Managed the quality system requirements for class II and III medical devices.
highlights: Technical lead engineer responsible for compliance across all departments for meeting FDA and ISO requirements
Successfuly managed external audits for complaince to quality system compliance

work.summary: Managed the development of OEM medical devices.
highlights: Technical manager responsible leading teams to design and transfer medical devices to manufacturing.
Recognized for assisting the Sales and Marketing group with acquiring an $8 million contract
Recognized for saving the company over $100,000 for sourcing needs thru ebay.com

work.summary: Responsible for CAD design and modeling of next generation manufucaturing processes for the research and development group.
highlights: Recognized for introducing a novel manufacturing process to supply fiber optics bundles into a larger nested cabling system.
